news.title: Papers accepted to Intelligent Virtual Agents 2018
news.details: RAG members had six papers accepted to the  [Intelligent Virtual Agents](http://iva2018.westernsydney.edu.au/) conference in Syndney, Australia.

news.title: RAG awarded grant for Church-based Community health project
news.details: RAG receives [NSF](http://nsf.gov) Smart and Connected Communities grant to develop Church-based health intervention.

news.title: Professor Bickmore gives closing keynote at eCHW 2017
news.details: Prof. Bickmore gave the closing keynote at the [e-Coaching conference](https://www.echw.science) in Amsterdam

news.title: Relational Agents group award grant for palliate care.
news.details: RAG receives NIH R01 grant to develop agents for palliative care.

news.title: Virtual Nurse system licensed to Telerent Corp.
Northeastern tapped to host the IVA 2014 conference
news.details: Northeastern University hosted the [Intelligent Virtual Agents conference](http://www.ccs.neu.edu/iva2014/), [[News report](http://www.northeastern.edu/news/2014/09/intelligent-virtual-agents-conference/)]

news.title: Secretary of Health and Human Services demoes Virtual Nurse Project
news.details: Kathleen Sebelius, Secretary of [Health and Human Services](http://www.dhhs.gov/), received a demonstration of the [Virtual Nurse](project/archive/virtual-nurse) from Carolyn Clancy, Director of the [Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality](http://www.ahrq.gov/).
